::Hot Rod::

He took her hand.
"Yes, I love you more than anything I have ever loved," he said, trying
to be as romatic as he could.

Ultra Magnus came over the comm. Hot Rod's face went into shock.
His old friend was alive! He had had 3 mentors as a young Autobot:
Prime, Kup, and Magnus. After he took command as Rodimus Prime, Magnus
was his most trusted advisor, and second in command. He decided to act
good.
"I'll come to you, Magnus. Where are you?"
